original_text: But I answered, “No, Lord, I would certainly not do that. I have never eaten an animal that our Law says is unclean.”
korean_text: 내가 이르되 주님 그럴 수 없나이다 속되거나 깨끗하지 아니한 것은 결코 내 입에 들어간 일이 없나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: I would certainly not do that
I have never eaten an animal
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 결코 동물을 먹은 적이 없습니다

sentences.original_text: that our Law says is unclean
